name: JoEll Byrnes (Kuoppala) - Whatcom County Real Estate Broker

google_reviews.author: Sandy Hartman
google_reviews.review: Truly an amazing honest realtor. When the house I was renting was sold before my contract was over.  JoEll made sure I would be able to finish out my contract, find a new place to live, before the new owners could move in. She has become a true friend.

owner_response.text: Thank you love. It was purely my honor and pleasure.  I hope you are doing well and miss chatting at you

google_reviews.author: Faith Tynsky
google_reviews.review: Amazing agent. Joell worked with me and my family for about a year helping us find the perfect home. She was always available no matter the time of day. She answered all my questions,( even the ridiculous ones) and if she didn't have the answer she had the resources to get the answers and she used them. Joell always treated me and my family as a priority which made the whole experience priceless. It's not often you find someone so willing to fight for you especially when there's not much in it for them. Joell was and is a true blessing for me and my family. She steared me in all the right directions from building my credit to the right lending company. We thank her for all her dedication and hard work and all her knowledge. *****

google_reviews.author: Michael Bennett
google_reviews.review: My Fiance and I had been looking for a house for close to 3 years without any luck. Once we were introduced to JoEll we now had an agent that had our best interests in mind as well as not trying to push us into something that wouldn't work. Because of everything JoEll did we were able to find something that fit us as well as close on it faster than our loan agent said we could. If you want honest answers and a person who does everything in her skill set to get you where you want, look no further then JoEll!

owner_response.text: You guys were amazing to work with and it was purely my honor and pleasure

google_reviews.author: Wyoming Ghan
google_reviews.review: She is awesome!!! Extremely nice, very relatable and genuinely cares. I was first time buyer and decided not to buy in the area but still talk to her. Most agents are very robotic and just care about money, this gal does what she can to make sure everyone gets to complete their home buying dreams. She helped my grandparents get into a home they never even thought was possible for them to get. If you are a first time buyer in this area, this gal will do what she can with her heart of gold

owner_response.text: Thank you so much. I aim to be there best that I can be for my Clients

google_reviews.author: steven rosvold
google_reviews.review: Fantastic service from JoEll. She really listened to what we wanted.  She was patient and diligent.

google_reviews.author: Janie Tompke
google_reviews.review: I love working with JoEll...she is professional and thorough when working with clients and other agents.  I highly recommend her.

owner_response.text: Thank you Janie I love working with you too.

google_reviews.author: Caleb Posey
google_reviews.review: Id recommend JoEll to anyone I know looking to buy or sell a house! She is a woman that knows how to get the job done.

owner_response.text: Thank you so very much Caleb. I do my best and work hard for every client
Thank you Xinkai it was such a pleasure and honor to help you.

summary.text:
Good

This article highlights the overwhelmingly positive sentiments expressed in user reviews regarding JoEll Byrnes (Kuoppala) as a real estate broker in Whatcom County. Many users describe her as an extremely dedicated agent who genuinely cares about her clients’ needs. For instance, one user mentioned that JoEll assisted them while their rental home was being sold, ensuring they could complete their lease and find a new place to live before the new owners moved in. Such testimonials accentuate her commitment to her clients' wellbeing and seamless transitions during the buying or renting process.

Moreover, users frequently commend JoEll for her excellent communication and availability. Many reviews highlight her prompt responses and willingness to address any questions, no matter how trivial they may seem. One user fondly recalled how JoEll guided them through the home-buying process, showcasing her knack for providing valuable resources and knowledge, which made their experience notably better. This level of attentive service has led many to recommend her to friends and family, proudly advocating for her professionalism and capability.

Great

User reviews consistently elevate JoEll's service to a high standard, often noting her unparalleled dedication and comprehensive knowledge in real estate. Many users appreciate her ability to genuinely listen to their needs and aspirations, which is particularly important for first-time buyers navigating an intimidating market. The specificity of recommendations, such as directing clients to suitable lending companies and offering advice to boost credit, sets her apart as a diligent and resourceful agent.

Bad

While there are no negative reviews outlined in the gathered user feedback for JoEll Byrnes (Kuoppala), it's important to note that in any service-oriented field, experiences can vary. The absence of lower ratings or complaints might suggest a lack of exposure or challenges in her role, but it may also reflect an overall high level of satisfaction among clients. This could mean that her approach effectively mitigates issues that typically lead to dissatisfaction within property management or real estate services.

Ugly

Again, there are no substantial negative experiences reported by users, which is quite remarkable for a real estate broker. The reviews did not mention any severe shortcomings, such as failure to address maintenance issues, retention of security deposits, or communication breakdowns, which are common grievances in property management. Instead, the consistent praise suggests that JoEll has maintained an outstanding professional standard that has precluded negative experiences during her tenure.
